page.title: 18A Day in the life of Lisa.
page.content: A typical day for me would be to get up at 7.45.I get dressed in my school uniform which is a grey or navy blue skirt,a light blue blouse,a navy blue jumper and a blue tie.I have muesili and milk for breakfast.Muesili is a mixture of oats,nuts,raisins,dried dates and bananas it's delicious and very good for you.I also have a cup of tea. I leave for school at 8.45.School starts at 9 o'clock.The first lesson of the day is always Mathematics.At 10 o'clock all the children go to the hall for assembly.We sing hymns and are told bible stories.Assembly ends at 10.30.We then have play until 10.50.We then have English until 12 o'clock.Lunch time lasts until 1.10. During the afternoon we have enjoyable subjects like art and craft,history and science.School finishes at 3.40.
